detectors.description:
OpenDefiExchangeProxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/rinkeby/sorted/0.8.4/367e63C8204EfaDf712403c8c71A51Ad2B4c74bC_OpenDefiExchangeProxy.sol/367e63C8204EfaDf712403c8c71A51Ad2B4c74bC_OpenDefiExchangeProxy.sol#6-35) may be an upgradeable proxy.
impl is declared in the proxy.
OpenDefiExchangeProxy.fallback().impl (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/rinkeby/sorted/0.8.4/367e63C8204EfaDf712403c8c71A51Ad2B4c74bC_OpenDefiExchangeProxy.sol/367e63C8204EfaDf712403c8c71A51Ad2B4c74bC_OpenDefiExchangeProxy.sol#15) gets value from a cross-contract call: IBeacon(beacon).implementation()
IBeacon appears to be a Beacon contract for the proxy
The address of IBeacon is stored as a state variable: OpenDefiExchangeProxy.beacon
Could not find setter for beacon
Found compatibility checks in all upgrade functions.
